title: About Me
text:
Education
2022–2025 Bachelor of Science in Physics University of British Columbia Vancouver, BC

Relevant Coursework: Electromagnetism, Intermediate/Advanced Mechanics, Thermodynamics, Quantum Mechanics, General Relativity, Computational Physics, Statistical Mechanics, Applications of Quantum Mechanics, Mathematical Physics, Machine Learning for Physics and Astronomy, Astrophysics, Cosmology, Probability with Physical Applications, Applied Linear Algebra, Calculus IV
Dean’s List in Junior year 2023–2024

2020–2022 Double Degree B.S. in Electrical Engineering (Transferred to UBC) Feng Chia University / San Jose State University Taichung, Taiwan

Relevant Coursework: Calculus I–III, Linear Algebra, Ordinary Differential Equations, MATLAB programming, C programming
Awarded Certificate of Achievement for outstanding achievement and excellence during 2020-2022
Dean’s List (Fall 2021, Spring 2021)
4 scholarships for Academic Excellence
